email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The vessel has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $50.75 per MT. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider something in the low 50s, say $50.25 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $50.50 per MT, which I believe is fair given the current market. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro-rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised rate. We can agree to $50.50 per MT. However, could we push the laycan to 18-23 October? Also, can you confirm the load and discharge ports? Best, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad we’re on the same page regarding the freight rate. I’ve checked with the vessel owner, and the laycan can be adjusted to 18-23 October. The load port will be Ras Tanura, and the discharge port is Rotterdam. Let me know if you need any further details. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $50.50 per MT, laycan 18-23 October, load port Ras Tanura, and discharge port Rotterdam. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! I’ll prepare the charter party and send it over for your review by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and I look forward to finalizing this shipment. Best, Sarah.
